metadata.title: CVE-2019-9211 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: There is a reachable assertion abort in the functionwrite_long_string_missing_values() in data/sys-file-writer.c in libdata.ain GNU PSPP 1.2.0 that will lead to denial of service.

criterions.comment: pspp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
